questions.question: This term refers to a network of infected computers that are controlled by a central command and used to carry out malicious activities.
This type of attack involves using a botnet to overwhelm a target with traffic, causing it to become unavailable.
This term refers to the individual or group that controls a botnet.
This type of malware is used to infect computers and add them to a botnet.
This term refers to the process of taking control of a botnet by law enforcement or security researchers.
